bioghist.p: Benjamin Mendlowitz is a marine photographer. His pictures have appeared in many magazines, including Nautical Quarterly, Sail, WoodenBoat, Yachting, and Connoisseur, and in his Calendar of Wooden Boats. He lives in Brooklin, Maine.

scopecontent.p: A collection of approximately 60 photographic prints of wooden boats by Benjamin Mendlowitz. Subjects include sneakboxes, beetle cats. Vessels include Annie, Aida, and Twilight. Also includes approximately 150 duplicate slides of the photographic prints and other images by Mendlowitz. The prints were displayed in an exhibition at the Philadelphia Maritime Museum (now ISM) in 1988. Some of the photographs appear in the published volume Wood, Water & Light: Classic Wooden Boats, 1988.
